001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
009import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
011import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
012import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.adapter.ListAdapter;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.FragmentListBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.ApodViewModel;
017import java.util.List;
018
019@AndroidEntryPoint
020public class ListFragment extends Fragment {
021
022  private FragmentListBinding binding;
023
024  private RecyclerView favoritesRecyclerView;
025  private ListAdapter adapter;
026  private ApodViewModel viewModel;
027  private ListType listType;
028
029  @Override
030  public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
031    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
032    listType = ListFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments()).getListType();
033  }
034
035  @Nullable
036  @Override
037  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
038      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
039    binding = FragmentListBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
040    return binding.getRoot();
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
045    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
046    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(ApodViewModel.class);
047    viewModel.getFavorites().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(),
048        this::setupRecyclerView); // Updated method call
049  }
050
051  private void setupRecyclerView(List<Apod> apods) {
052    adapter = new ListAdapter(requireContext(), apods);
053    binding.apods.setAdapter(adapter);
054  }
055
056  public enum ListType {
057
058    FAVORITES, BIRTHDAY
059  }
060}
